solution_line_template: For {num_servings} servings, Thomas needs {num_servings}*{cups_per_serving} = <<{num_servings}*{cups_per_serving}={total_cups_needed}>>{total_cups_needed} cups of chickpeas.
To have {total_cups_needed} cups, Thomas needs {total_cups_needed}*{ounces_per_cup} = <<{total_cups_needed}*{ounces_per_cup}={total_ounces_needed}>>{total_ounces_needed} ounces.
Since Thomas cannot buy half a can, he needs to buy {cans_to_buy} cans.
